desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人要求野乃美介紹黑市，以作為讓她從小流氓手中脫險的代價。因此一行人便與步美同行一段時間。另一方面，便利屋68的社長亞瑠，為了挽回之前的敗仗而尋找借用資金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长阿露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人要求野乃美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.thai: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.ko: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_tw: 巡視黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所償還的債款流入暗黑銀行。當學生們得知自己努力還的錢被用來做違法勾當，便在一怒之下決定搶銀行。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.thai: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.ko: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_tw: 透過從暗黑銀行帶來的文件，對策委員會一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企業<凱薩公司>。在包圍學校的社會巨惡面前，學生們失去鬥志後決定暫時解散。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.thai: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.ko: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人經過對記錄的詳細檢查，發現記錄的確流向了黑市銀行，並發現自己的款項被直接用於頭盔團的支援工作。一切表明凱撒公司似乎對阿拜多斯圖謀不軌。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成員取得的錢攻擊阿拜多斯高中。對此，亞瑠感到良心的譴責而苦惱不斷。為了鼓勵無精打采的亞瑠，便利屋職員們一同前往柴關拉麵店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出現在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在廢棄工廠遇到長得像人類的機器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井為了阻止遊戲開發部被廢社，於是便把愛麗絲帶到社團活動室，打算讓她成為社團成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在廢墟的一個天坑里發現了睡著著的愛麗絲，發現了“AL-1S”之類的字樣。綠可憐愛麗絲，便決定將她帶回千年，還給她穿上了自己的衣服。就在這時，愛麗絲因與老師接觸而醒了過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井將愛麗絲帶回到社團活動室，綠非常驚詫。愛麗絲因為不懂，開始亂動社團的東西，比如把手柄和遊戲機塞進嘴里之類。桃井隨後說出了自己的計劃：她想讓愛麗絲偽裝成千年的學生加入社團，解決人數不夠被廢社的問題。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲開心地玩著遊戲開發部的前作<傳說年代記>。遊戲開發部全員看她玩得這麼開心都大受感動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.thai: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠討論將愛麗絲偽裝成千年學生計劃的可行性。桃井負責去拿到假學生證，而綠和柚子負責教愛麗絲“說話”，希望將其高度機械化的語音模式修改過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行離開，綠為如何教愛麗絲說話而苦惱著。這時，愛麗絲則發現了一本曾經寫著他們做的遊戲的雜誌。綠於是決定讓愛麗絲玩玩自己的遊戲，試著用遊戲中的對話教會愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.

desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠兩人的幫助下，愛麗絲在三小時內通關了True End。兩人問及愛麗絲對遊戲的評價時，愛麗絲認為遊戲很有意思，聽到此言的柚子終於從櫃子裡出來了。柚子真誠地對愛麗絲道了謝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.thai: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.ko: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人抵達目的地——位於廢墟的工廠。愛麗絲在那裡靠直覺找到儲存<G.Bible>的電腦，並且成功把資料下載到遊戲機裡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.thai: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.ko: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_tw: 眾人到達了工廠，但愛麗絲卻突然記起了什麼，自顧自的行動。眾人跟隨著愛麗絲，找到了一台搭載著“Divi: Sion”系統的電腦。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.

Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.

desc.zh_tw: 電腦認出了愛麗絲，但突然電量不足即將關機，數據被毀在即；為了得到其存儲的《G.Bible》，桃井獻出了自己的遊戲機與存檔。數據得以保存，但需密碼才可訪問；桃井大聲抱怨，結果引來了機器人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.thai: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.ko: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_tw: 因為耽誤到時間的關係，朱音和花凛也從封鎖中解放出來。就這樣，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危機。這時，愛麗絲及時現身解救遊戲開發部，讓一行人成功進入學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.thai: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.ko: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 優香命令將收繳來的機器人加入戰場，明日奈的戰力也絕非等閒之輩，工程部無力壓制狙擊手花凜，朱音也正在趕來。在似乎無望之際，眾人想起了之前會議的內容。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.

desc.zh_tw: 眾人認為計劃的容錯率完全為零，因而需要準備後備計劃。停電後，愛麗絲檢測到時機成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 優香等人終於到齊，宣佈了要把遊戲開發部關禁閉的處分。愛麗絲突然出現，以光之劍破除了障礙；花凜也被重新壓制。愛麗絲特別提到，在所有RPG遊戲中，勇者是從來不會放棄同伴的。受到鼓勵的眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 戰鬥後，朱音對任務失敗一事向寧瑠道歉，但寧瑠卻反而表示，對和女僕部打得不相上下的愛麗絲感興趣。另一方面，回到社團活動室的遊戲開發部一行人試著使用<鏡子>解讀<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.thai: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.ko: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音為接下該項委託給大家蒙羞抱歉，尼祿則表示大可不必，並表示委託已被取消。尼祿對愛麗絲特別感興趣，讓明日奈等人去查清遊戲開發部全員的資料。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，尼禄则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。尼禄对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
